title-group.article-title: "Happy, Happy Ever after": Story and History in Art Spiegelman's "Maus"

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1997 The Journal of Narrative Technique

ref.mixed-citation: Spiegelman's brilliant use of comics "work[s] not against the grain of the cartoon but within its richest inheritance ... exploring the deepest possibilities unique to the form ... " (31)
Joseph Witek (ch. 4)
"Metaphor" 278-80
